Articles.Content: Could anyone give me a walk-through on how to download the .craft or .zip files so i can download ships? also if this changes anything i play on steam. thanks in advance

Assuming you've downloaded the ship already, simply drag the .craft into the appropriate folder inside the "Ships" folder in "C:\Program Files\Steam\Steamapps\common\ksp" (Windows 32-bit) or "~/Library/Application Support/Steam/Steamapps/common/ksp" (Mac OSX).

However, if you have yet to download one, it's very simple. Click on the link for the ship you want to download, and follow the steps above.
